document.full_text: e-mail messages released tuesday between representatives of gov. scott walker and some senate democrats suggest that mr. walker has privately considered agreeing to at least some changes.
document.title: hard stance seems softer in e-mail of wisconsin governor
lines_and_colors: e-mail messages released tuesday between representatives of gov. scott walker and some senate democrats suggest that mr. walker has privately considered agreeing to at least some changes.
